io.github.ocelot.client

Class ShapeRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ocelot.client.ShapeRenderer

  • public class ShapeRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

    Renders GL11C.GL_QUADS to the screen using enhanced precision and BufferBuilder.

    To use chain rendering, use begin() to start rendering and end() to complete a batch.

    Since:
    0.1.0
